title: The Fish
desc:
Post 2490
- As you play this card, every player draws a Poker card. (face-up)
- From now on, while this is in your ID zone, all other players will draw Poker cards face-down. They will not know the card's color(s), number, or effects until they try to play it.
- If a player tries to play a face-down card that they can't, it will return to their hand face-up, and their turn will be skipped.
